"やあ、今日はどんな用かな？<br>ふむ……バレンタインのプレゼントに<br>も:
"私は、甘いモノには目がなくてねえ。
クッキーならいくらでも食べられるし
ケーキもパフェも、もちろんチョコも。"

"食べ物以外なら、珍しいモノかな。
貝殻、アキビン……多くの人が捨てて
しまうようなモノにも、輝きがある。"

"つまり、私に限って言うなら……
「珍しくて甘いモノ」が、もらったら
最高に嬉しいもの、だね。"

"Ho-ho-ho!
This place is quite frank and good."
"Ho-ho-ho! You're remarkably composed, given how dire our situation is."
"Ho-ho-ho! For me, Christmas is about all the wonderful things that you get to eat."
"That succulent roast bird, the enormous cake... Food like that is what makes it really feel like Christmas."
"All the food in this cafe is of the highest quality, so this Christmas, I plan to feast until I cannot even manage so much as a small, wafer-thin mint."
"Ho-ho-ho! How wonderful it is to have peace at last."
"I plan to celebrate by enjoying the finest food and desserts the cafe has to offer."
